page.title: 07St. Martin's Village Shops
page.content: In the area around St. Martin's church, the main amenities are two shops, {General Stores}and{Crown {Stores.} Both are basically grocery shops, selling fresh food, tinned and packaged goods and frozen foods. Goods are usually delivered once a week. Locally grown fruit and vegetables are delivered daily. The shops are open for ten hours a day, and holiday-makers as well as local people shop here in the summer. Both shops stock a wide range of provisions and special goods such as books, postcards, plugs, barbecue charcoal, newspapers, stamps, wines and spirits.They also have a small delicatessen. Because the shops are isolated they provide services such as local advertising, taxi and car hire, and are agents for dry cleaning.
